article_title: Another view: Obamacare in need of surgery, STAT!
article_text:
Another view: Obamacare in need of surgery, STAT!

Insurers are bailing out, premiums and penalties are rising and unpopularity is growing. The law must be reformed.

Posted May. 4, 2016 at 11:30 AM
